blogPost.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
blogPost.body: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
blogPost.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code ✨
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一个无代码平台，用于构建强大的网络和移动应用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。与Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需两次点击。
localize.tagline: 为每个平台构建应用程序，无需代码✨。

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一個無代碼平臺，用於構建強大的網絡和移動應用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。與Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需兩次點擊。
localize.tagline: 爲每個平臺構建應用程序，無需代碼✨。

previous.excerpt: Lendtable gives employees the cash to max out their full 401(k) match and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP). Sign up in 3 minutes to start earning thousands of dollars a year from your employee benefits.
previous.title: Lendtable - We give you the money to max out your employee benefits

localize.description: Lendtable为员工提供现金，使他们的401(k)匹配计划和员工股票购买计划(ESPP)达到最大值。在3分钟内注册，开始从您的员工福利中每年赚取数千美元。
localize.tagline: 我们给你钱，让你的员工福利最大化

localize.description: Lendtable爲員工提供現金，使他們的401(k)匹配計劃和員工股票購買計劃(ESPP)達到最大值。在3分鐘內註冊，開始從您的員工福利中每年賺取數千美元。
localize.tagline: 我們給你錢，讓你的員工福利最大化

next.excerpt: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
next.title: LinkFree - Your social website, for free.

localize.description: 我们Snipfeed的团队创建了LinkFree，因为我们认为创作者应该免费将他们最喜欢的链接汇总到一个漂亮的登陆页面中。
我們Snipfeed的團隊創建了LinkFree，因爲我們認爲創作者應該免費將他們最喜歡的鏈接彙總到一個漂亮的登陸頁面中。
